sentences.en: A plug had been inserted in the drill hole.
sentences.cn: 钻孔已塞上了塞子。

sentences.en: a pronunciation drill
sentences.cn: 发音练习

sentences.en: a whine like a dentist’s drill
sentences.cn: 像牙钻发出的那种呜呜声

sentences.en: an electric drill
sentences.cn: 电钻

sentences.en: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.cn: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

sentences.en: He used a drill to bore a hole in the door.
sentences.cn: 他用钻在门上钻孔.

sentences.en: It took five years to drill down to bedrock.
sentences.cn: 耗时五年才钻到了基岩。

sentences.en: Keep the drill steady while it ascends and descends.
sentences.cn: 打钻和提钻时要保持钻头平稳。

sentences.en: rifle drill
sentences.cn: 步枪操练

sentences.en: The army paraded round drill squares.
sentences.cn: 军队绕训练场列队行进.

sentences.en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

sentences.en: The drill has variable speed control.
sentences.cn: 这钻机有变速控制。

sentences.en: The drill is over.
sentences.cn: 操练完毕.

sentences.en: The drill should be slowly rotated to ensure a clean hole.
sentences.cn: 钻头必须缓慢转动，以保证钻孔平整光滑。

sentences.en: The electric drill can also be used as a screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 这把电钻也可用作螺丝刀.

sentences.en: The grain was sown in drill.
sentences.cn: 这种谷物是条播的.

sentences.en: The soldiers were at drill in the barrack - yard .
sentences.cn: 士兵们在兵营 练兵场 操练.

sentences.en: This drill can bore through rock.
sentences.cn: 这台凿岩机能钻透岩石.

sentences.en: You should drill some manners into the boy.
sentences.cn: 你应该教这孩子懂点礼貌.

sentences.en: You'll have to disassemble the drill.
sentences.cn: 你得拆开这个钻头。

words.tran_cn: 训练；[矿业]钻孔机；钻子；[农机]播种机

phrases.tran_cn: 金刚石钻头，金刚石钻具
套管钻进；训练（某人）掌握（某种技能， 法则等）
钻床；钻机；半自动立式钻床
消防演习；逃逸等应急措施演习
回转式凿岩机，旋转钻机

trans.tran_cn: 钻头，练习，训练，常规，粗斜纹布，演习
trans.tran_en: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to train soldiers to march or perform other military actions
a method of teaching students, sports players etc something by making them repeat the same lesson, exercise etc many times
